fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Blame (Night): Choose an Unseen player and another target. You will redirect one visit from the Unseen member to your second target.
- Talk to the Hand (Night, 1 use): All players that visit an Unseen member tonight will be roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The visits you redirect from the Unseen member using Blame will prioritize killing abilities, then investigative abilities, then any other visitors prioritizing protective abilities at the very bottom. If multiple visitors in the same category visit your target, you will redirect the player that sent in their final action first.
- You are roleblock and redirect immune.
